name: v1.86.0
body:
## Dear ImGui v1.86
Consider reading the official [changelog ](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/releases/tag/v1.86) to see other Dear ImGui changes.

## What's Changed
* [API] Add a mechanism for Dear ImGui assertion callbacks by @tlf30 in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/100
* [Build] Gradle 7.3.3 by @SpaiR in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/101
* [API] Dear ImGui v1.86 by @SpaiR in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/102

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/compare/v1.85.1...v1.86.0

* [`adf9d5f`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/adf9d5fe4e1240de7f89f5b2b50f0d6d62de1d7e) - [Build] Update publish scripts

* [`dcf0dea`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/dcf0dea9f3d4c3cc731262246e5e796ac3bdd92c) - [Build] Gradle 7.3.3 (#101)
* [`e972af8`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/e972af840e8cfbec1339c6c1e600816766d1e6b2) - [API] Dear ImGui v1.86 (#102)
* [`384e24a`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/384e24a6c59e7fa3e4a575824bff37506ab6883e) - [API] Up OpenGL impl
* [`0c37ac6`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/0c37ac6dfd7f9fa096f3a93bb085335cc56faa7b) - [API] Up GLFW impl

name: v1.85.0
body:
## Dear ImGui v1.85
Consider reading the official [changelog ](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/releases/tag/v1.85) to see other Dear ImGui changes.

## What's Changed
* Bindings for ImGuiColorTextEdit 🙂  by @SocketByte in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/79
* Implemented binding for ImGui::getWindowScrollbarRect by @AlTsayun in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/81
* Added multi Y plotShaded by @tlf30 in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/84
* Initial setup for ImGuiFileDialog extension by @tlf30 in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/89
* Update readme for ImGuiFileDialog by @tlf30 in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/90

## New Contributors
* @SocketByte made their first contribution in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/79
* @AlTsayun made their first contribution in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/81
* @tlf30 made their first contribution in https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/pull/84

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/compare/v1.84.1.0...v1.85.0

name: v1.84.1.0
body:
Consider reading the official [changelog ](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/releases/tag/v1.84) to see other Dear ImGui changes.

* [`a4dd33e`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/a4dd33e421f47bde4f8b3991e92ca4fc7de63395) - [Build] Remove useless release changelog line
* [`255f2e2`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/255f2e228633c7b434269a5ba956432e59bbbc24) - [Build] Move sourceCompatibility option to the root build file
* [`babb8ed`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/babb8ed313f4688ffa6223f6efc9fd6ecb26e3e6) - [Build] Gradle 7.2

name: v1.83.3
body: * [`78694a4`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/78694a42637d360f72cb3c4e1a9b25cf70431b8a) - [API] Add ImGuiContext struct and ability to switch Dear ImGui contexts (#65)

name: v1.83.2
body:
* [`34e282e`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/34e282e091224afffd7e530d98406e43a9b47703) - [API] Fixed window rendering on resize and white background on start up (#62)
* [`1544682`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/1544682cc40a5377eb63cd323bb7f120ec6d88a9) - [Build] Add workflows for automatic releases
* [`44a1a18`](http://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java/commit/44a1a18907e08dc10eccac87ea8b837bfa634260) - [Build] Gradle 7.1.1
Added [ImPlot](https://github.com/epezent/implot) extension (#56) [@calvertdw @perrymacmurray];

- Updated `ImGuiImplGl3` to the latest Dear ImGui implementation; [d1e264a66365ccd1c3c7bc94fb687aebcabae230]
- Updated `ImGuiImplGlfw` to the latest Dear ImGui implementation; [e8678ef62ca458402694cb9d5d501b7a46257906]
  Now it will check GLFW version and ignore features, which are not available for user.
- FreeType font renderer is now optional, read [FreeType section](https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java#freetype) for more info.

**Refactored Drag & Drop API**

The original Dear ImGui uses raw byte arrays as a payload data. This is fine for C++, yet unacceptable for Java.
Binding has a method `setDragDropPayloadObject()`, which is able to take a Java object as a payload.
Now it's the only available method and it was renamed to `setDragDropPayload()`.

API itself was extended, so now you can pass any payload, without passing `String` data type.
Binding will take payload class as an identifier. For example, now you can write:
```
static CustomClass PAYLOAD = new CustomClass();

ImGui.setDragDropPayload(PAYLOAD);
...and later...
CustomClass payload = ImGui.acceptDragDropPayload(CustomClass.class);
```
Binding will do a proper typecasting automatically.

- Updated Dear ImGui to v1.79
- Fixed four of the ImGuiTreeNodeFlags that were all set to Framed (#26) [@silentorb]
- Added `clone()` method to `ImRect` class

#### Build instruction update
Readme now has a [How to Build Native Libraries](https://github.com/SpaiR/imgui-java#how-to-build-native-libraries) section. It shows how to build natives libraries for all OS, so everyone can play with it.

- Binding will extract libraries from classpath into unique folder
- Added ImGuiTextFilter API
Added internal `ImGuiItemFlags` api
Fixed a bug with method arguments for dockBuilderSplitNode

Added support for [DockBuilder](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/blob/05bc204dbd80dfebb3dab1511caf1cb980620c76/imgui_internal.h#L2146-L2168) API. It could be used to created windows docked from start. https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/issues/2109#issuecomment-426204357
A proper example has been added as well.

name: v1.78-1.0
body:
**WARNING!**
Binding address has been updated. It's the same but with `imgui-java` prefix for artifacts id. Check readme to see dependencies instruction. 

---

- Updated Dear ImGui to v1.78.
- Added support for [multi-viewports](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/issues/1542) feature. If you have your own backend implementation, take a note that this feature require a lot of effort to utilize its functionality. Use `imgui.glfw.ImGuiImplGlfw` implementation instead. Otherwise no guarantees provided.
- Classes which are represent native structs was refactored. Now they have a public field `ptr` which points to their native structure. It's not recommended to touch this field if you don't know what are you doing.
Fixed render viewport for retina displays
Added `ImString#isEmpty` and `ImString#isNotEmpty` methods

Minor API improvements on the Java layer
- Methods to get only X/Y instead of full ImVec2
- Methods to add/remove config/backend flags
Update imgui-java to [Dear ImGui v1.77](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/releases/tag/v1.77)
- Add port of GLFW backend (#13) [@ambye85]

- Add ImGuiIO::NavInputs
- Add ImString support for "null" values
  `new ImString(null)` or `imString.set(null)` will work in the same way `String.valueOf(null)` does.

- Refactor packages structure:
	- All primitive wrappers are moved to the separate package `imgui.type`
	- Rename: `imgui.callbacks` -> `imgui.callback`
	- Rename: `imgui.enums` -> `imgui.flag`
	- `ImGuiInputTextData` converted into the inner class of `ImString` and renamed to `InputData`
	- Rename class: `ImBool` -> `ImBoolean`
- Add `ImGuiStorage` class
- Simplify drag'n'drop API with new methods: `setDragDropPayloadObject(String, Object)`, `acceptDragDropPayloadObject(String): Object`, `getDragDropPayloadObject(): Object`. With new methods you can use any Java object as payload. Read javadoc to get more info.
- Optimize and reduce memory footprint for `ImFontAtlas#getTexDataAsAlpha8`/`ImFontAtlas#getTexDataAsRGBA32` methods

- Fix draw lists
- Add new methods to create draw lists with fixed pointer (`getWindowDrawListNew()`, `getBackgroundDrawListNew()`, `getForegroundDrawListNew()`). Read javadoc to get more info
- Improve color API. Methods which are work with colors are now can take 4 float, 4 int or 1 int number. For RGBA color packed in 4 or 1 value appropriately.
- Add `ImColor` helper to create a ABGR packed int value used by Dear ImGui
- Implement `Clonable` interface for all primitive wrappers
- `getID` method now returns ID as an int number
- Add ImGuiOnceUponAFrame helper
MacOS support
[Docking](https://github.com/ocornut/imgui/issues/2109) support!
Add `ImGui#checkbox` method which can take a simple boolean instead of ImBool.

- Fix auto-resize for ImString
 - Make ImString to return a UTF-8 encoded string value

- Refactor LWJGL3 renderer routine. Small performance improvements and fix for OpenGL contexts >= 3.2
 - Add Freetype support to build fonts texture
* Fix Windows x64 build
* [#3] Fix binding for input fields

* Fix treeNode methods and pointer types
* Natively mapped ImGuiStyle class

Added new methods to provide and get separate `ImGuiStyle.Colors` values
 * `setColor(ImGuiCol, float, float, float, float)`
 * `getColor(ImGuiCol, ImVec4)`

* **Dear ImGui updated to v1.75**
* Fonts API, usage example could be found in example app
	* ImFont
	* ImFontConfig
	* ImFontAtlas
	* ImFontGlyph
* Documentation improvements

- Additional overloaded methods for **ImGui#image** and **ImGui#imageButton**
- Additional native methods for **ImDrawList**
	* pushClipRect
	* pushClipRectFullScreen
	* popClipRect
	* pushTextureId
	* popTextureId
	* getClipRectMin
	* getClipRectMax
